text: The Kyivan Rus Park (in Ukrainian: "Парк Київська Русь") is a cultural, commercial and entertainment complex in Kopachiv village, Obuhivskyi raion. 34 km. from Kyiv, Ukraine. the park was opened in 2008 in a site that restores the Kyiv Kremlin that was the Kremlin of Kyiv in the 5th to 8th century. == Gallery == file:Забороли Древнього Києва.jpg| |thumb| file:Передгороддя та княжі трибуни.jpg| file:Василівська церква.jpg| | file:Ярославові ворота.jpg| file:Садиба заможного киянина - ювеліра.jpg| file:Корчма.jpg| file:Вежа-повалуша.jpg| file:Терем Ярослава Мудрого.jpg| | | | | | == Related pages == * Izmailovo Kremlin == Other websites == * Official website of Kyivan Rus Park Category:Buildings and structures in Ukraine Category:Entertainment in Ukraine Category:Museums in Europe
title: Kyivan Rus Park
